title: League of Legends Bundesliga starts on 28.03.2015

embed.description: Hello Guys, I wanna start a new Tournament for fun! We play 5vs5 Draft Pick at Summoners Rift. You need min. 6 players...

body:
Hello guys,

we wanna start a Tournament! Every week is one game. The Tournament starts on 28.03.2015. 

Prizes:
We will see which prizes we get.(I hope good one)

You need a team of 6 because you need one substitution when one of your team have no time.
You also can log in as solo player so you can make a team with other solo players.
Highest elo which is allowed is Gold 1.
Smurfs aren't allowed!

I hope you are interested in!

We will have a lots of fun!

Greetings The_Deient

replies.body: And today , when starts the first game?
I hope so too but now we have only 4 teams i think with a few more it would be better;)
U said only o Gold 1 but someone in the tournament is plat.
he was carried up i saw it on his lol king score
Nice i hope it will be fun :D
